fs.fibu2.filter
Class AbstractFilterPreferences

java.lang.Object
  fs.fibu2.filter.AbstractFilterPreferences

public class AbstractFilterPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods for inserting general filter preferences into a given Preferences node and for retrieving them.

Author:
Simon Hampe

Method Detail

insert

public static void insert(java.util.prefs.Preferences node,
                          StandardFilterComponent.Selection type,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String equality,
                          java.lang.String pattern,
                          java.lang.String min,
                          java.lang.String max)
Inserts a few basic key-value pairs into a given node. node and type must not be null, all strings might be null (If so, no entry is inserted)

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - if node or type is null

getType

public static StandardFilterComponent.Selection getType(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Looks for an entry of key 'type' and returns its value. Returns null, if the entry does not exist or does not contain a value which represents a StandardFilterComponent.Selection or if node == null

getIdString

public static java.lang.String getIdString(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Returns:
The value of the entry with key 'id' or null, if it doesn't exist

getEqualityString

public static java.lang.String getEqualityString(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Returns:
The value of the entry with key 'equality' or null, if it doesn't exist

public static java.lang.String getMinString(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Returns:
The value of the entry with key 'min' or null, if it doesn't exist

getMaxString

public static java.lang.String getMaxString(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Returns:
The value of the entry with key 'max' or null, if it doesn't exist
